summary: During World War II, several oddly assorted military experts are teamed in a mission to raid and destroy a bridge vital to enemy strategy.
cast: Robert Shaw|Harrison Ford|Barbara Bach|Edward Fox|Franco Nero|Carl Weathers|Richard Kiel|Alan Badel|Michael Byrne|Philip Latham|Angus MacInnes|Michael Sheard|Petar Buntic|Leslie Schofield|Anthony Langdon|Richard Hampton|Paul Humpoletz|Dicken Ashworth|Christopher Malcolm|Nick Ellsworth|Jonathan Blake|Roger Owen|Francis Mughan|Mike Sirett|Graeme Crowther|Jim Dowdall|Michael Osborne|Edward Peel|Michael Josephs|JÃ¼rgen Andersen|David Gretton|Paul Jerricho|Edward Kalinski|Robert Gillespie|Wolf Kahler|Hans Kahler|Ramiz Pasic|Patrick Allen|Paul Angelis|Peter Brace|Tony Clarkin|Harry Fielder|Robert Rietty
title: Fuerza 10 de Navarone
